Name: T.D.Z. 3 Dark Way of Stalker
About the game: Story The Dead Zone 3 Dark Way of Stalker is a game with an interesting storyline! The plot of the game tells us about a young stalker named Peter. Losing his own son, he had no other choice... The last chance for him was a 'ticket' to a gloomy zone in which there is everything for earning large sums. At your own risk, our hero goes on a dangerous raid to save a loved one. Waiting for you: Soulful atmosphere Not everything is as simple as it may seem at first glance. The path of our hero is complex and unpredictable. One thing pleases - loyal comrades and a guitar by the campfire, romance and that's all! In our game you can enjoy such a moment. A real stalker brotherhood! The Raven, the Old One and the Raccoon are your faithful companions! A mixture of genres in one bottle! It is not always calm in the zone, often you have to make difficult choices and rely only on your intuition and ingenuity. Be always on the alert, because the game is full of various turns of events. Here you can meet: ★ Fascinating puzzles ★ Horror elements with hide and seek and chase ★ Shootouts with mutants ★ Chase on the UAZ ★ Hand-to-hand fighting ★ 2 endings with different outcome of the final Complete quests, explore locations and help your friends! Fight for the life of a loved one and get the long-awaited outcome! Good luck in this exciting adventure, Stalker! Only the chosen one will be able to walk the Dark Path in the dangerous exclusion zone! Our game will definitely not let you get bored. Despite not the most advanced graphics, we can 100% promise you a pleasant pastime and the most vivid impressions! This story will definitely not leave you indifferent. The Exclusion Zone is waiting!
